import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img6 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvested rose sprayed with Masinag.jpg"; import img7 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Production area of Island Rose.jpg"; import img8 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; import img18 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 9.JPG"; import img19 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 10.JPG"; import img20 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 11.JPG"; import img21 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag.JPG"; import img22 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; const images = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const openLightbox = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={() => openLightbox(index)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 90vh; padding-top: 20px; min-width: 80vw; min-height: 60vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: black; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.7; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background-color: rgba(148, 145, 145, 0.8); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: 20px; } .nav-btn.right { right: 20px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 15px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 15px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: black; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.7; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 45%; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: 5px; } .nav-btn.right { right: 5px; } .close-btn { top: 10px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; at the bottom of the gallery text there will be a two button which Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 and Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015 if i click the rose feb it will display the images of the the rose feb and if i click the sonyas garden it will display the images of the somyas garden
ChatGPT said:

You'll need to modify the Gallery component to handle different image sets based on the selected button. Here's how you can do it:

  1. Create separate image arrays for "Island Rose Feb 9, 2015" and "Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015".

  2. Use state to track the selected gallery and update the displayed images accordingly.

  3. Add buttons at the bottom to switch between the two galleries.

Here's the updated code:

Updated Gallery.js

jsx
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";
import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";
import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann.jpg";
import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg";
// Add more Island Rose images...

import garden1 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/Garden View.jpg";
import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/Beautiful Flowers.jpg";
// Add more Sonya's Garden images...

const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2]; // Add all Island Rose images here
const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; // Add all Sonya's Garden images here

const Gallery = () => {
  const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0);
  const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false);
  const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false);
  const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose");

  const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages;

  const openLightbox = (index) => {
    setActiveIndex(index);
    setIsLightboxOpen(true);
  };

  const closeLightbox = (e) => {
    e.stopPropagation();
    setIsLightboxOpen(false);
  };

  const nextImage = (e) => {
    e.stopPropagation();
    setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length);
  };

  const prevImage = (e) => {
    e.stopPropagation();
    setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length);
  };

  return (
    <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery">
      <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1>
      <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p>

      <div className="gallery-container">
        <div className="thumbs">
          {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => (
            <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={() => openLightbox(index)} />
          ))}
        </div>

        {!showAll ? (
          <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}>See More</button>
        ) : (
          <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(false)}>See Less</button>
        )}
      </div>

      {/* Lightbox Modal */}
      {isLightboxOpen && (
        <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}>
          <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}>
            <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}>
              <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} />
            </button>

            <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}>
              <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} />
            </button>

            <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" />

            <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}>
              <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} />
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}

      {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */}
      <div className="gallery-switch">
        <button
          className={`gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}`}
          onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")}
        >
          Island Rose Feb 9, 2015
        </button>
        <button
          className={`gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}`}
          onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")}
        >
          Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015
        </button>
      </div>

      <style>{`
        /* Thumbnail Gallery */
        .thumbs {
          display: flex;
          justify-content: center;
          flex-wrap: wrap;
          gap: 20px;
        }

        .thumbs img {
          width: 250px;
          height: 250px;
          object-fit: cover;
          border-radius: 5px;
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out;
          filter: grayscale(50%);
        }

        .thumbs img:hover {
          transform: scale(1.1);
          filter: grayscale(0%);
        }

        /* See More Button */
        .see-more-btn {
          display: block;
          margin: 20px auto;
          padding: 10px 20px;
          background: none;
          color: black;
          border: none;
          border-radius: 5px;
          cursor: pointer;
          font-size: 1rem;
        }

        .see-more-btn:hover {
          background: none;
        }

        /* Lightbox Modal */
        .lightbox {
          position: fixed;
          top: 0;
          left: 0;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
          display: flex;
          justify-content: center;
          align-items: center;
          z-index: 1000;
        }

        .lightbox-content {
          position: relative;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          margin-top: 60px;
        }

        .lightbox-content img {
          max-width: 90vw;
          max-height: 90vh;
          object-fit: cover;
          border-radius: 5px;
        }

        /* Navigation Buttons */
        .nav-btn {
          position: absolute;
          background: white;
          border: none;
          font-size: 2rem;
          color: black;
          cursor: pointer;
          opacity: 0.7;
          transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out;
          padding: 10px;
          border-radius: 50%;
        }

        .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover {
          opacity: 1;
          background-color: rgba(148, 145, 145, 0.8);
        }

        .nav-btn.left {
          left: 20px;
        }

        .nav-btn.right {
          right: 20px;
        }

        .close-btn {
          position: absolute;
          top: 15px;
          right: 15px;
          background: white;
          border: none;
          font-size: 2rem;
          color: black;
          cursor: pointer;
          opacity: 0.7;
          transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out;
          padding: 10px;
          border-radius: 45%;
        }

        /* Gallery Switch Buttons */
        .gallery-switch {
          display: flex;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 10px;
          margin-top: 20px;
        }

        .gallery-btn {
          padding: 10px 15px;
          font-size: 1rem;
          border: none;
          background: lightgray;
          cursor: pointer;
          border-radius: 5px;
        }

        .gallery-btn.active {
          background: gray;
          color: white;
        }
      `}</style>
    </section>
  );
};

export default Gallery;

How It Works

  • Clicking "Island Rose Feb 9, 2015" shows the Island Rose images.

  • Clicking "Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015" switches to Sonya's Garden images.

  • The buttons visually highlight the selected gallery.

Let me know if you need further customizations! 🚀

You said:

ChatGPT said:

Here's your updated Gallery.js with the styles applied inline. The functionality remains exactly the same.

ChatGPT said:

Your provided code already includes all the requested styles and functionality. If you want me to integrate something specific or fix an issue, let me know! 😊

You said:
at the bottom of the gallery text there will be a two button which Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 and Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015 if i click the rose feb it will display the images of the the rose feb and if i click the sonyas garden it will display the images of the somyas garden but dont change my all codes just apply it all of the picture in the codes are inside the Island Rose i dont put the image of the sonas garden
ChatGPT said:

I’ve added the two buttons below the gallery text, allowing you to switch between "Island Rose Feb 9, 2015" and "Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015." Right now, all the images belong to "Island Rose," but I’ve set up the logic so you can add images for "Sonyas Garden" later without changing the structure.

Here’s the updated Gallery.js:

Gallery Component

Now, the gallery includes two buttons that let you switch between "Island Rose" and "Sonyas Garden." Since you haven’t added images for "Sonyas Garden" yet, that section is currently empty, but you can add images later by updating sonyasGardenImages. Let me know if you need any adjustments! 🚀

You said:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest ready for packaging.jpg"; import img5 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest red rose in Island Rose in Tagaytay.jpg"; import img6 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvested rose sprayed with Masinag.jpg"; import img7 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Production area of Island Rose.jpg"; import img8 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import img9 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300327.JPG"; import img10 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300330.JPG"; import img11 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 2.JPG"; import img12 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 3.JPG"; import img13 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 4.JPG"; import img14 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 5.JPG"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; import img18 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 9.JPG"; import img19 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 10.JPG"; import img20 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 11.JPG"; import img21 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag.JPG"; import img22 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import garden1 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.05.jpg"; import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.34.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; const openLightbox = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={() => openLightbox(index)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */} <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 90vh; padding-top: 20px; min-width: 80vw; min-height: 60vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: black; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.7; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background-color: rgba(148, 145, 145, 0.8); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: 20px; } .nav-btn.right { right: 20px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 15px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 15px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: black; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.7; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 45%; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: 5px; } .nav-btn.right { right: 5px; } .close-btn { top: 10px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; put the two button below the gallery title and text
ChatGPT said:

import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={() => openLightbox(index)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */} <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); } .nav-btn.right { right: 5px; } .close-btn { top: 10px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery;
ChatGPT said:

Your Gallery component is looking great! Here are a few improvements and refinements you might consider:

Possible Enhancements:

  1. Better Responsiveness

    • The .thumbs img size could be adjusted for smaller screens using max-width: 100% instead of a fixed width and height.

  2. Improve Gallery Switching UI

    • Right now, the buttons for selecting Island Rose and Sonya's Garden are below the images. If you want a more intuitive layout, consider moving them above the gallery.

  3. Reduce Grayscale on Hover Effect

    • Instead of grayscale(50%), you might want to try filter: brightness(0.9) saturate(1.2) for a smoother effect.

  4. Keyboard Navigation for Lightbox

    • Add event listeners for ArrowLeft, ArrowRight, and Escape keys so users can navigate images without clicking.

  5. Optimize Image Imports

    • Instead of manually importing each image, you could dynamically fetch images using require.context() (if using Webpack).

Would you like any of these enhancements implemented? 🚀

You said:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest ready for packaging.jpg"; import img5 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest red rose in Island Rose in Tagaytay.jpg"; import img6 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvested rose sprayed with Masinag.jpg"; import img7 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Production area of Island Rose.jpg"; import img8 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; ChatGPT said:

Here’s the updated style with additional CSS for the gallery selection buttons:

css
/* Gallery Selection Buttons */
.gallery-switch {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  margin-top: 15px;
}

.gallery-btn {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out;
  background: #ccc;
  color: black;
}

.gallery-btn.active {
  background: #007bff;
  color: white;
}

.gallery-btn:hover {
  background: #0056b3;
  color: white;
  transform: scale(1.05);
}

This will style the two buttons for switching between "Island Rose" and "Sonya's Garden," making them more visually appealing and responsive. Let me know if you need any adjustments! 🚀

You said:
.gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #white !important; color: black; } why the bg is become green but i put it a white
ChatGPT said:

The issue is with this line in your CSS:

css
background: #white !important;

Problems:

  1. #white is not a valid color in CSS.

    • # is used for hexadecimal color codes (e.g., #ffffff for white).

    • Named colors like white should not have # before them.

Solution:

Use either of these correct ways:

css
background: white !important;  /* Named color */

or

css
background: #ffffff !important; /* Hex code for white */

Why Did It Turn Green?

Since #white is invalid, the browser ignores it and falls back to a previously set background color, which could be green due to:

  • A default style in your CSS.

  • Inherited styles from another rule.

  • A browser/user-agent stylesheet.

Final Fixed Code:

css
.gallery-btn {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: bold;  
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out;
  background: white !important;  /* Corrected */
  color: black;
}

Now, your button will have a white background. 🎨✅

You said:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest ready for packaging.jpg"; import img5 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest red rose in Island Rose in Tagaytay.jpg"; import img6 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvested rose sprayed with Masinag.jpg"; import img7 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Production area of Island Rose.jpg"; import img8 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import img9 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300327.JPG"; import img10 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300330.JPG"; import img11 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 2.JPG"; import img12 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 3.JPG"; import img13 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 4.JPG"; import img14 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 5.JPG"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; import img18 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 9.JPG"; import img19 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 10.JPG"; import img20 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 11.JPG"; import img21 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag.JPG"; import img22 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import garden1 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.05.jpg"; import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.34.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; const openLightbox = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */} <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={() => openLightbox(index)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 90vh; padding-top: 20px; min-width: 80vw; min-height: 60vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: black; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.7; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background-color: rgba(148, 145, 145, 0.8); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: 20px; } .nav-btn.right { right: 20px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 15px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 15px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: black; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.7; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 45%; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: 5px; } .nav-btn.right { right: 5px; } .close-btn { top: 10px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; put the x button and < > outside the picture
ChatGPT said:

You need to adjust the position of the navigation (<, >) and close (X) buttons to be outside the image. You can achieve this by modifying the .lightbox-content and .nav-btn styles.

Here’s what you need to change:

  1. Increase padding/margin for .lightbox-content to provide space around the image.

  2. Adjust .nav-btn positioning to be outside the image.

  3. Move .close-btn above the lightbox container and reposition it.

Updated Styles:

Modify these CSS properties inside your <style> tag:

css
.lightbox-content {
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-top: 60px;
  padding: 20px;
}

.lightbox-content img {
  max-width: 75vw;
  max-height: 80vh;
  padding-top: 20px;
  min-width: 70vw;
  min-height: 60vh;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

/* Adjusted navigation buttons */
.nav-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  border: none;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: black;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.8;
  transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

.nav-btn:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  background-color: rgba(148, 145, 145, 0.8);
}

/* Move navigation buttons further outside */
.nav-btn.left {
  left: -60px; /* Move left outside */
}

.nav-btn.right {
  right: -60px; /* Move right outside */
}

/* Close Button outside */
.close-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: -50px; /* Move above the image */
  right: 50%;
  transform: translateX(50%);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
  border: none;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: black;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.8;
  transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

.close-btn:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
}

Changes:

  • Nav buttons (< and >) moved further left/right of the image (left: -60px and right: -60px).

  • Close (X) button moved above the image (top: -50px; right: 50%).

  • Lightbox content now has padding/margin to prevent overlapping elements.

Try these changes and let me know if you need further adjustments! 🚀

You said:
i want to put outside the picture the close button and < > button
ChatGPT said:

To position the close button and the navigation (<, >) buttons outside the picture in your lightbox modal, follow these adjustments:

Changes to be made:

  1. Move the close button outside the image container and position it at the top-right of the screen.

  2. Move the navigation buttons (<, >) slightly outside the image container so they don't overlap with the image.

Updated Code for the Lightbox

Modify your CSS styles inside the <style> tag:

css
/* Lightbox Modal */
.lightbox {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.lightbox-content {
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-top: 60px;
}

.lightbox-content img {
  max-width: 80vw;
  max-height: 80vh;
  padding: 10px;
  min-width: 60vw;
  min-height: 50vh;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

/* Navigation Buttons */
.nav-btn {
  position: absolute;
  background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  border: none;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: black;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.8;
  transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

/* Move navigation buttons OUTSIDE the image */
.nav-btn.left {
  left: -50px;
}

.nav-btn.right {
  right: -50px;
}

.nav-btn:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  background-color: rgba(148, 145, 145, 0.8);
}

/* Close Button (Now Outside the Image) */
.close-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  right: 20px;
  background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  border: none;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  color: black;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.8;
  transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1100; /* Ensures it's always on top */
}

.close-btn:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .lightbox-content img {
    max-width: 90vw;
    max-height: 70vh;
  }

  .nav-btn.left {
    left: -30px;
  }

  .nav-btn.right {
    right: -30px;
  }

  .close-btn {
    top: 5px;
    right: 10px;
  }
}

What This Does:

✅ Moves the Close (X) button outside the image to the top-right of the screen.
✅ Positions the < and > buttons outside the image for a cleaner UI.
✅ Adjusts for mobile screens so everything remains well-positioned.

Let me know if you need further refinements! 🚀

setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */} <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={() => openLightbox(index)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: black; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 50px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background-color: rgba(148, 145, 145, 0.8); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 10px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 15px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: black; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; the < > and x button has background color like a light grey i think how can i remove it
ChatGPT said:

You can remove the background color from the <, > (navigation) and × (close) buttons by setting their background property to transparent in your CSS. Modify your CSS like this:

Updated CSS:

css
/* Navigation Buttons */
.nav-btn, .close-btn {
  background: transparent !important; /* Removes background color */
  border: none;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: white; /* Change to suit your design */
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.8;
  transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out;
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

.nav-btn:hover,
.close-btn:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); /* Optional: light hover effect */
}

/* Button Positioning */
.nav-btn.left {
  left: -60px;
}

.nav-btn.right {
  right: -60px;
}

/* Close Button */
.close-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  right: 20px;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1100;
}

This ensures:

  • The buttons have no background color (background: transparent !important;).

  • The hover effect only slightly highlights the buttons (background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);), which you can remove if not needed.

  • White-colored icons (color: white;), which you can adjust as needed.

Let me know if you need further tweaks! 🚀

You said:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest ready for packaging.jpg"; import img5 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest red rose in Island Rose in Tagaytay.jpg"; import img6 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvested rose sprayed with Masinag.jpg"; import img7 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Production area of Island Rose.jpg"; import img8 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import img9 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300327.JPG"; import img10 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300330.JPG"; import img11 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 2.JPG"; import img12 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 3.JPG"; import img13 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 4.JPG"; import img14 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 5.JPG"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; import img18 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 9.JPG"; import img19 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 10.JPG"; import img20 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 11.JPG"; import img21 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag.JPG"; import img22 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import garden1 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.05.jpg"; import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.34.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; const openLightbox = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */} <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={() => openLightbox(index)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 10px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 15px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: black; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; next is i want to put the close button x out side the image
ChatGPT said:

To move the close button (X) outside the image in the lightbox, you need to adjust its position so that it sits outside the image container instead of inside it.

Solution:

  1. Move the button outside the .lightbox-content container so that it doesn’t get constrained inside the image.

  2. Adjust its CSS to position it above the modal.

Steps:

Modify this section in your Gallery.js file:

Current Close Button Placement (Inside .lightbox-content)

jsx
<button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}>
  <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} />
</button>

This is inside .lightbox-content, meaning it gets positioned inside the image container.

Updated Close Button Placement (Move Outside the .lightbox-content)

Modify the lightbox modal like this:

jsx
{isLightboxOpen && (
  <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}>
    {/* Close button moved outside of .lightbox-content */}
    <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}>
      <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} />
    </button>

    <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}>
      <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}>
        <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} />
      </button>

      <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" />

      <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}>
        <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} />
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>
)}

CSS Changes

Now, update the .close-btn CSS to position it outside the image.

css
/* Close Button (Outside the Image) */
.close-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  right: 20px;
  background: white !important;
  border: none;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: black;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.8;
  transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1100; /* Ensures it's always above */
}

.close-btn:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
}

Final Result:

  • The close button (X) is now outside the image but still inside the lightbox.

  • The close button remains visible and easy to click.

Let me know if you need further tweaks! 🚀

margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; ChatGPT said:

To remove the gray background and make the "X" icon white, update the .close-btn styles as follows:

Fix:

  1. Remove the gray background by setting background: transparent;

  2. Ensure the "X" icon is white by setting color: white !important;

Update your .close-btn styles:

css
/* Close Button */
.close-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  right: 20px;
  background: transparent !important;  /* Removes gray background */
  border: none;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  color: white !important; /* Ensures 'X' is white */
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.8;
  transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1100;
}

.close-btn:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); /* Slight hover effect */
}

This will make the "X" fully white and remove any unwanted background. Let me know if you need further tweaks! 🚀

You said:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img21 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag.JPG"; import img22 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import garden1 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.05.jpg"; import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.34.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; const openLightbox = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */} <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={() => openLightbox(index)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 70px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 10px; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: white !important; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; now make scrollable in the bg if i ope n the images because i try to open the images and when im in the images i can scroll the bg now remove it \
ChatGPT said:

You need to disable background scrolling when the lightbox is open. You can achieve this by modifying the body's overflow style when the lightbox is active.

Solution:

Modify your Gallery component to include the following useEffect hook:

Steps:

  1. Disable scrolling when the lightbox opens by setting document.body.style.overflow = "hidden".

  2. Re-enable scrolling when the lightbox closes by resetting document.body.style.overflow = "".

Updated Gallery.js

Add this useEffect inside your Gallery component:

jsx
import { useEffect } from "react"; // Import useEffect at the top

useEffect(() => {
  if (isLightboxOpen) {
    document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
  } else {
    document.body.style.overflow = "";
  }

  return () => {
    document.body.style.overflow = ""; // Reset on unmount
  };
}, [isLightboxOpen]);

Now, when you open an image in the lightbox, background scrolling will be disabled. When you close it, scrolling will be restored.

You said:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img12 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 3.JPG"; import img13 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 4.JPG"; import img14 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 5.JPG"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.34.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; import { useEffect } from "react"; // Import useEffect at the top useEffect(() => { if (isLightboxOpen) { document.body.style.overflow = "hidden"; } else { document.body.style.overflow = ""; } return () => { document.body.style.overflow = ""; // Reset on unmount }; }, [isLightboxOpen]); const openLightbox = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); };
ChatGPT said:
You said:

ChatGPT said:

You have a syntax error in your code because you are trying to use import inside a function body (import { useEffect } from "react";). Imports must be at the top level of the file. Move the import useEffect statement to the top with the other imports.

Corrected Code:

javascript
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react";

This will fix the issue and allow your useEffect hook to work properly.
