ChatGPT said:

It looks like the issue is that document.body.style.overflow = "hidden"; is not being applied properly. Try adding this to ensure it works correctly:

Fix:

  1. Apply overflow: hidden to html as well:
    Sometimes, document.body.style.overflow = "hidden"; is not enough. You need to apply it to the html element too.

  2. Force reflow by setting height: 100vh
    This ensures no accidental scrolling.

Updated useEffect:

Modify your useEffect in Gallery.js:

javascript
useEffect(() => {
  if (isLightboxOpen) {
    document.documentElement.style.overflow = "hidden"; // Prevent scrolling
    document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    document.body.style.height = "100vh"; // Ensure no scrolling
  } else {
    document.documentElement.style.overflow = "";
    document.body.style.overflow = "";
    document.body.style.height = "";
  }

  return () => {
    document.documentElement.style.overflow = "";
    document.body.style.overflow = "";
    document.body.style.height = "";
  };
}, [isLightboxOpen]);

Alternative CSS Fix:

If JavaScript doesn’t fully work, try adding this CSS when the lightbox is open:

css
.lightbox-open {
  overflow: hidden;
  height: 100vh;
}

body.lightbox-open {
  overflow: hidden;
  height: 100vh;
}

And in your useEffect, toggle this class:

javascript
useEffect(() => {
  if (isLightboxOpen) {
    document.body.classList.add("lightbox-open");
  } else {
    document.body.classList.remove("lightbox-open");
  }

  return () => {
    document.body.classList.remove("lightbox-open");
  };
}, [isLightboxOpen]);

Try these fixes and let me know if it works! 🚀

You said:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest ready for packaging.jpg"; import img5 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest red rose in Island Rose in Tagaytay.jpg"; import img6 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvested rose sprayed with Masinag.jpg"; import img7 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Production area of Island Rose.jpg"; import img8 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import img9 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300327.JPG"; import img10 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300330.JPG"; import img11 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 2.JPG"; import img12 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 3.JPG"; import img13 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 4.JPG"; import img14 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 5.JPG"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; import img18 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 9.JPG"; import img19 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 10.JPG"; import img20 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 11.JPG"; import img21 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag.JPG"; import img22 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import garden1 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.05.jpg"; import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.34.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; useEffect(() => { if (isLightboxOpen) { document.documentElement.style.overflow = "hidden"; // Prevent scrolling document.body.style.overflow = "hidden"; document.body.style.height = "100vh"; // Ensure no scrolling } else { document.documentElement.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.height = ""; } return () => { document.documentElement.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.height = ""; }; }, [isLightboxOpen]); const openLightbox = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */} <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={() => openLightbox(index)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 70px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 10px; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: white !important; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; if i open the gallery image it sends me in the home screen of the website i want if i open the image it will stay at the galley secion
ChatGPT said:

It sounds like clicking on an image in the gallery might be causing the page to reload or navigate to the home screen. This could be due to a default anchor behavior or an unintended event propagation issue.

Fix

Try adding e.preventDefault() inside the openLightbox function to prevent any default navigation behavior when clicking on an image.

Updated openLightbox function:

javascript
const openLightbox = (index, e) => {
  e.preventDefault(); // Prevents default navigation behavior
  e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental event propagation
  setActiveIndex(index);
  setIsLightboxOpen(true);
};

Fix in the <img> click event:

Update the image click handler by passing the event as a second argument:

jsx
<img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} />

This should ensure that clicking an image in the gallery does not cause the page to reload or navigate to another section. Let me know if the issue persists! 🚀

ChatGPT said:

It looks like the issue is caused by the setShowAll(false) function call inside the "See Less" button. The scrollIntoView function is being triggered, but if the page refreshes or re-renders incorrectly, it might not remain at the gallery section.

Solution:

Modify your "See Less" button's onClick function to ensure it stays at the gallery section. Instead of calling document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }), you can try:

Fix: Use setTimeout to Delay Scrolling

This ensures that the page stays at the gallery section after the update.

jsx
<button
  style={{ cursor: "pointer", color: "blue", textDecoration: "underline" }}
  className="see-more-btn"
  onClick={() => {
    setShowAll(false);
    setTimeout(() => {
      document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "start" });
    }, 100); // Small delay to let the state update before scrolling
  }}
>
  See Less
</button>

Alternative: Prevent Scroll Jump by Using window.scrollTo

If scrollIntoView is causing unexpected behavior, you can manually set the scroll position like this:

jsx
<button
  style={{ cursor: "pointer", color: "blue", textDecoration: "underline" }}
  className="see-more-btn"
  onClick={() => {
    const galleryTop = document.getElementById("gallery").offsetTop; // Get exact position
    setShowAll(false);
    window.scrollTo({ top: galleryTop, behavior: "smooth" }); // Smooth scrolling to stay at the section
  }}
>
  See Less
</button>

These should prevent the page from jumping back to the top of the home section. Let me know if you need further adjustments! 🚀

You said:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; useEffect(() => { if (isLightboxOpen) { document.documentElement.style.overflow = "hidden"; // Prevent scrolling document.body.style.overflow = "hidden"; }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */} <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); setTimeout(() => { document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }, 100); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 70px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 10px; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: white !important; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; if i click a image in the gallery it send me to the home screen section i want if i open a image it will stay at the gallery section fix it
ChatGPT said:

Your issue occurs because clicking an image triggers a default link action, possibly due to how your app structure works. You can prevent this by stopping the event propagation correctly.

Fix:

  1. Ensure e.preventDefault() is applied properly in openLightbox.

  2. Modify how the modal opens to prevent unintended navigations.

Updated openLightbox Function

Replace your openLightbox function with this version:

javascript
const openLightbox = (index, e) => {
  e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default navigation behavior
  e.stopPropagation(); // Stop event from bubbling up
  setActiveIndex(index);
  setIsLightboxOpen(true);

  // Scroll to the gallery section
  setTimeout(() => {
    document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center" });
  }, 100);
};

This ensures that:

  • Clicking on an image does not navigate away.

  • The page scrolls smoothly to the gallery section, keeping focus on it.

You said:

const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; useEffect(() => { if (isLightboxOpen) { document.documentElement.style.overflow = "hidden"; // Prevent scrolling document.body.style.overflow = "hidden"; document.body.style.height = "100vh"; // Ensure no scrolling } else { document.documentElement.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.height = ""; } return () => { document.documentElement.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.height = ""; }; }, [isLightboxOpen]); const openLightbox = (index, e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevents default action of the event e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; setTimeout(() => { document.getElementById("gallery") .scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center"}); }, 100); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */} <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => { setShowAll(false); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); }} > See Less </button> )} </div> {/* Lightbox Modal */} {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 70px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 10px; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: white !important; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; [{ "resource": "/c:/Users/mii/Desktop/charles/my-project/src/components/Gallery.js", "owner": "eslint", "severity": 8, "message": "Parsing error: 'return' outside of function. (87:2)", "source": "eslint", "startLineNumber": 87, "startColumn": 2, "endLineNumber": 87, "endColumn": 2 },{ "resource": "/c:/Users/mii/Desktop/charles/my-project/src/components/Gallery.js", "owner": "typescript", "code": "1128", "severity": 8, "message": "Declaration or statement expected.", "source": "ts", "startLineNumber": 335, "startColumn": 1, "endLineNumber": 335, "endColumn": 2 }]
ChatGPT said:

You have a syntax error in your Gallery.js file. The issue is that the return statement is outside of the function. This is happening because your openLightbox function is mistakenly closed with a semicolon }; before the return statement.

How to Fix

Modify your Gallery.js file by moving the misplaced setTimeout outside the function and ensuring the return statement is correctly placed inside the Gallery component.

Corrected Code:

js
const Gallery = () => {
  const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0);
  const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false);
  const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false);
  const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose");

  const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages;
   
  useEffect(() => {
    if (isLightboxOpen) {
      document.documentElement.style.overflow = "hidden"; // Prevent scrolling
      document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
      document.body.style.height = "100vh"; // Ensure no scrolling
    } else {
      document.documentElement.style.overflow = "";
      document.body.style.overflow = "";
      document.body.style.height = "";
    }
  
    return () => {
      document.documentElement.style.overflow = "";
      document.body.style.overflow = "";
      document.body.style.height = "";
    };
  }, [isLightboxOpen]);

  const openLightbox = (index, e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    e.stopPropagation();
    setActiveIndex(index);
    setIsLightboxOpen(true);
  };

  const closeLightbox = (e) => {
    e.stopPropagation();
    setIsLightboxOpen(false);
  };

  const nextImage = (e) => {
    e.stopPropagation();
    setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length);
  };

  const prevImage = (e) => {
    e.stopPropagation();
    setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length);
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    setTimeout(() => {
      document.getElementById("gallery")?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center" });
    }, 100);
  }, []); // Ensures this runs once when the component mounts

  return (
    <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery">
      <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1>
      <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p>
      {/* Gallery Selection Buttons */}
      
      <div className="gallery-switch">
        <button
          className={`gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}`}
          onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")}
        >
          Island Rose Feb 9, 2015
        </button>
        <button
          className={`gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}`}
          onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")}
        >
          Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015
        </button>
      </div>

      <div className="gallery-container">
        <div className="thumbs">
          {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => (
            <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} />
          ))}
        </div>

        {!showAll ? (
          <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}>
            See More
          </button>
        ) : (
          <button style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'blue', textDecoration: 'underline' }} 
            className="see-more-btn"
            onClick={() => {
              setShowAll(false);
              document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" });
            }}
          >
            See Less
          </button>
        )}
      </div>

      {/* Lightbox Modal */}
      {isLightboxOpen && (
        <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}>
          <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}>
              <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} />
            </button>

          <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}>

            <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}>
              <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} />
            </button>

            <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" />

            <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}>
              <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} />
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </section>
  );
};

export default Gallery;

What Was Fixed?

  1. Removed misplaced return statement that was outside the function.

  2. Fixed the misplaced setTimeout so that it runs inside a useEffect and only executes when the component mounts.

  3. Ensured all functions are properly closed before returning JSX.

This should resolve your ESLint parsing error. Try running your app again! 🚀

You said:
if i click the image the background sent me in the home screen how can i fix it i want if i clicck the image it will stay at the gallery section import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 70px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 10px; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: white !important; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery;
ChatGPT said:

The issue is likely that when you click an image, the page scrolls back to the top or another section. To ensure that clicking an image keeps the user in the gallery section, you can do the following:

Solution:

  1. Prevent Default Behavior: You're already using e.preventDefault() in openLightbox, so that should be fine.

  2. Prevent Page Scrolling to Top: Ensure the lightbox opens without affecting the page's scroll position.

  3. Ensure the #gallery section stays in view: When opening the lightbox, use scrollIntoView() to keep the gallery section visible.

Update Your openLightbox Function:

Modify your function like this:

jsx
const openLightbox = (index, e) => {
  e.preventDefault();
  e.stopPropagation();
  
  setActiveIndex(index);
  setIsLightboxOpen(true);

  // Ensure the gallery stays in view
  document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center" });
};

Explanation:

  • document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center" }): This keeps the gallery section visible, even when the lightbox opens.

  • block: "center" ensures the section remains in the middle of the screen.

Try this and let me know if it fixes the issue! 🚀

You said:
if i add that it has an error [{ "resource": "/c:/Users/mii/Desktop/charles/my-project/src/components/Gallery.js", "owner": "eslint", "severity": 8, "message": "Parsing error: 'return' outside of function. (82:2)", "source": "eslint", "startLineNumber": 82, "startColumn": 2, "endLineNumber": 82, "endColumn": 2 },{ "resource": "/c:/Users/mii/Desktop/charles/my-project/src/components/Gallery.js", "owner": "typescript", "code": "1128", "severity": 8, "message": "Declaration or statement expected.", "source": "ts", "startLineNumber": 330, "startColumn": 1, "endLineNumber": 330, "endColumn": 2 }] return () => { document.documentElement.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.overflow = ""; document.body.style.height = ""; }; }, [isLightboxOpen]); document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center" }); }; const openLightbox = (index, e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevents default action of the event e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevents accidental clicks from propagating setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p>
ChatGPT said:

It looks like you have a misplaced return statement outside of a function, likely inside a useEffect.

How to Fix:

  1. Ensure the return statement is inside a function
    The cleanup function (the one returning styles) should be inside a useEffect.

  2. Fix document.getElementById("gallery").scrollIntoView(...)
    This code is running directly in your component, which isn't allowed. If it's part of a useEffect, it must be wrapped properly.

Corrected Code:

jsx
useEffect(() => {
  if (isLightboxOpen) {
    document.documentElement.style.overflow = "hidden";
    document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    document.body.style.height = "100vh";
  } else {
    document.documentElement.style.overflow = "";
    document.body.style.overflow = "";
    document.body.style.height = "";
  }

  return () => {
    document.documentElement.style.overflow = "";
    document.body.style.overflow = "";
    document.body.style.height = "";
  };
}, [isLightboxOpen]);

useEffect(() => {
  const galleryElement = document.getElementById("gallery");
  if (galleryElement) {
    galleryElement.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center" });
  }
}, []); // Runs only once when the component mounts

Key Fixes:

  1. Ensured return is inside useEffect → This prevents the ESLint error.

  2. Moved scrollIntoView into useEffect → This prevents it from running outside a function.

Try this and let me know if you still get any errors! 🚀

ChatGPT said:

You have a syntax error at line 333, where an unexpected token is found. The issue is likely due to the incomplete useEffect statement before the openLightbox function. You need to close the function properly.

Fix:

Find this part of your code:

jsx
useEffect(() => {
  const galleryElement = document.getElementById("gallery");
  if (galleryElement) {
 gallerytElement.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center" });
};

This is missing a closing } and has a typo (gallerytElement should be galleryElement). Correct it like this:

jsx
useEffect(() => {
  const galleryElement = document.getElementById("gallery");
  if (galleryElement) {
    galleryElement.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "center" });
  }
}, []);

Summary of Fixes:

  • Fixed the missing closing bracket }.

  • Fixed the typo from gallerytElement to galleryElement.

  • Added an empty dependency array [] in useEffect to avoid unnecessary re-renders.

Try updating your code with this fix and check if the ESLint error disappears. 🚀

padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; it always put me in the home section everytime i click an image in the gallery fix all my codes to stay in the gallery
ChatGPT said:

import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; const openLightbox = (index, e) => { e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(false)}> See Less </button> )} </div> {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 70px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 10px; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: white !important; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest ready for packaging.jpg"; "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; dont change anything to my codes even 1 codes dont change just remove the scrollable bg inside the image because if i open one imag i can scroll the bg webseite
ChatGPT said:

To prevent background scrolling when the lightbox is open, add this effect inside your Gallery component:

jsx
useEffect(() => {
  if (isLightboxOpen) {
    document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
  } else {
    document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
  }

  return () => {
    document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
  };
}, [isLightboxOpen]);

This will disable scrolling on the background when the lightbox is open and restore it when it's closed. Let me know if you need further adjustments! 🚀

You said:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; apply it to my codes

import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest ready for packaging.jpg"; import img5 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest red rose in Island Rose in Tagaytay.jpg"; import img6 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvested rose sprayed with Masinag.jpg"; import img7 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Production area of Island Rose.jpg"; import img8 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import img9 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300327.JPG"; import img10 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300330.JPG"; import img11 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 2.JPG"; import img12 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 3.JPG"; import img13 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 4.JPG"; import img14 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 5.JPG"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; import img18 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 9.JPG"; import img19 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 10.JPG"; import img20 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 11.JPG"; import img21 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag.JPG"; import img22 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import garden1 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.05.jpg"; import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.34.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; const openLightbox = (index, e) => { e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(false)}> See Less </button> )} </div> {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 70px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 10px; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: white !important; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery;

import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest ready for packaging.jpg"; import img5 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest red rose in Island Rose in Tagaytay.jpg"; import img6 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvested rose sprayed with Masinag.jpg"; import img7 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Production area of Island Rose.jpg"; import img8 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import img9 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300327.JPG"; import img10 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300330.JPG"; import img11 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 2.JPG"; import img12 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 3.JPG"; import img13 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 4.JPG"; import img14 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 5.JPG"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; import img18 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 9.JPG"; import img19 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 10.JPG"; import img20 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 11.JPG"; import img21 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag.JPG"; import img22 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import garden1 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.05.jpg"; import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.34.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; useEffect(() => { if (isLightboxOpen) { document.body.style.overflow = "hidden"; } else { document.body.style.overflow = "auto"; } return () => { document.body.style.overflow = "auto"; }; }, [isLightboxOpen]); const openLightbox = (index, e) => { e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(false)}> See Less </button> )} </div> {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 70px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 10px; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: white !important; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; max-height: 70vh; } .nav-btn.left { left: -50px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -50px; } .close-btn { top: 5px; right: 10px; } } }</style> </section> ); }; export default Gallery; i can scroll again what the fuck your help is not working

You said:

Asked ChatGPT

import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faChevronLeft, faChevronRight, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Greenhouse handled by Ms. Mae Ann 2.JPG"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann with her plenty harvested Rose for the Mother's Day.jpg"; import img3 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Ms. Mae Ann-technician of Island Rose- wearing White long sleeve.jpg"; import img4 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest ready for packaging.jpg"; import img5 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvest red rose in Island Rose in Tagaytay.jpg"; import img6 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Newly harvested rose sprayed with Masinag.jpg"; import img7 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Production area of Island Rose.jpg"; import img8 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import img9 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300327.JPG"; import img10 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/P1300330.JPG"; import img11 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 2.JPG"; import img12 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 3.JPG"; import img13 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 4.JPG"; import img14 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 5.JPG"; import img15 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 6.JPG"; import img16 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 7.JPG"; import img17 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 8.JPG"; import img18 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 9.JPG"; import img19 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 10.JPG"; import img20 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag 11.JPG"; import img21 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Rose sprayed with Masinag.JPG"; import img22 from "../assets/imgs/Island Rose Feb 9, 2015/Set of ordered ready for delivery.jpg"; import garden1 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.05.jpg"; import garden2 from "../assets/imgs/Sonyas Garden Feb 9, 2015/2015-02-12 16.48.34.jpg"; const islandRoseImages = [img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6, img7, img8, img9, img10, img11, img12, img13, img14, img15, img16, img17, img18, img19, img20, img21, img22]; const sonyasGardenImages = [garden1, garden2]; const Gallery = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [showAll, setShowAll] = useState(false); const [isLightboxOpen, setIsLightboxOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedGallery, setSelectedGallery] = useState("islandRose"); const images = selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? islandRoseImages : sonyasGardenImages; useEffect(() => { document.body.style.overflow = isLightboxOpen ? "hidden" : "auto"; return () => { document.body.style.overflow = "auto"; }; }, [isLightboxOpen]); const openLightbox = (index, e) => { e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(false)}> See Less </button> )} </div> {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 20px; } .thumbs img { width: 250px; height: 250px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out, filter 0.2s ease-in-out; filter: grayscale(50%); } .thumbs img:hover { transform: scale(1.1); filter: grayscale(0%); } /* See More Button */ .see-more-btn { display: block; margin: 20px auto; padding: 10px 20px; background: none; color: black; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; } .see-more-btn:hover { background: none; } /* Lightbox Modal */ .lightbox { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1000; } .lightbox-content { position: relative; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 60px; } .lightbox-content img { max-width: 85vw; max-height: 85vh; padding: 10px; min-width: 60vw; min-height: 50vh; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 5px; } /* Navigation Buttons */ .nav-btn { position: absolute; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2rem; color: white; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 20px; border-radius: 50%; } .nav-btn:hover, .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); } /* Button Positioning */ .nav-btn.left { left: -60px; } .nav-btn.right { right: -60px; } /* Close Button */ .close-btn { position: absolute; top: 70px; right: 20px; margin-top: 15px; margin-right: 15px; right: 10px; background: transparent !important; border: none; font-size: 2.5rem; color: white !important; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in-out, background-color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px; border-radius: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); } /* Gallery Selection Buttons */ .gallery-switch { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 15px; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; } .gallery-btn { padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: bold; border: none; border-radius: 0px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out; background: #ffffff; color: black; } .gallery-btn.active { background:rgb(68, 105, 145); color: white; } .gallery-btn:hover { background: #0056b3; color: white; transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .lightbox-content img { max-width: 90vw; "hidden" : "auto"; return () => { document.body.style.overflow = "auto"; }; }, [isLightboxOpen]); const openLightbox = (index, e) => { e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex(index); setIsLightboxOpen(true); }; const closeLightbox = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setIsLightboxOpen(false); }; const nextImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev + 1) % images.length); }; const prevImage = (e) => { e.stopPropagation(); setActiveIndex((prev) => (prev - 1 + images.length) % images.length); }; return ( <section className="section_protocol" id="gallery"> <h1 className="text-center">Gallery</h1> <p className="text-center">Click on an image to view it in full size.</p> <div className="gallery-switch"> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "islandRose" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("islandRose")} > Island Rose Feb 9, 2015 </button> <button className={gallery-btn ${selectedGallery === "sonyasGarden" ? "active" : ""}} onClick={() => setSelectedGallery("sonyasGarden")} > Sonya's Garden Feb 9, 2015 </button> </div> <div className="gallery-container"> <div className="thumbs"> {(showAll ? images : images.slice(0, 4)).map((img, index) => ( <img key={index} src={img} alt="" onClick={(e) => openLightbox(index, e)} /> ))} </div> {!showAll ? ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(true)}> See More </button> ) : ( <button className="see-more-btn" onClick={() => setShowAll(false)}> See Less </button> )} </div> {isLightboxOpen && ( <div className="lightbox" onClick={closeLightbox}> <button className="close-btn" onClick={closeLightbox}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTimes} /> </button> <div className="lightbox-content" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}> <button className="nav-btn left" onClick={prevImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronLeft} /> </button> <img src={images[activeIndex]} alt="Large View" /> <button className="nav-btn right" onClick={nextImage}> <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faChevronRight} /> </button> </div> </div> )} <style>{ /* Thumbnail Gallery */ .thumbs { display: flex; ChatGPT said:

You need to prevent scrolling when the lightbox is open. You already have a useEffect that modifies document.body.style.overflow, but it may not be enough in some cases. Try this improved version:

Fix: Disable Scrolling Completely When Lightbox Is Open

Modify your useEffect like this:

js
useEffect(() => {
  if (isLightboxOpen) {
    document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    document.body.style.height = "100vh"; // Prevents scrolling
  } else {
    document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
    document.body.style.height = "auto";
  }

  return () => {
    document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
    document.body.style.height = "auto";
  };
}, [isLightboxOpen]);

This ensures:

  • No scrolling when the modal is open.

  • Restores normal scrolling when the modal is closed.

Try this and let me know if you still face issues! 🚀

You said:
but it sents me in the home screen i want it to stay at the gallery
ChatGPT said:

If the page jumps to the top when opening the modal, you need to preserve the scroll position before disabling scrolling. Here’s how to do it:

Fix: Preserve Scroll Position While Disabling Scrolling

Modify your useEffect like this:

js
useEffect(() => {
  if (isLightboxOpen) {
    const scrollY = window.scrollY; // Get current scroll position
    document.body.style.position = "fixed"; // Prevent scrolling
    document.body.style.top = `-${scrollY}px`; // Keep the page at the same scroll position
    document.body.style.left = "0";
    document.body.style.width = "100vw";
  } else {
    const scrollY = parseInt(document.body.style.top || "0") * -1;
    document.body.style.position = "";
    document.body.style.top = "";
    document.body.style.left = "";
    document.body.style.width = "";
    window.scrollTo(0, scrollY); // Restore scroll position
  }
}, [isLightboxOpen]);

What This Does:

✅ Prevents scrolling when the lightbox is open.
✅ Preserves the user's scroll position instead of jumping to the top.
✅ Restores normal scrolling when the lightbox is closed.

This should work perfectly. Try it out! 🚀
