min-width: 300px; text-align: left; } .product-btn { padding: 12px 24px; background-color: #28a745; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; transition: 0.3s; } .product-btn:hover { background-color: #218838; } /* Dark Mode */ .product-section.dark { background-color: #222; } .product-section.dark .product-text h2, .product-section.dark .product-text p { color: #fff !important; } /* Responsive */ @media (max-width: 768px) { .product-content { flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start; /* Keep left alignment on mobile */ } .product-text { max-width: 100%; padding-left: 0; margin-top: 20px; } .product-image img { width: 80%; } .price-tag { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 6px 10px; bottom: 5px; right: 5px; } .features-benefits-container { flex-direction: column; text-align: flex-start; } } }</style> </section> ); } export default Product; put the price at the bottom of the product image
ChatGPT said:

To position the price tag at the bottom of the product image, you need to adjust the position properties of .price-tag. Here’s the fix:

Updated CSS for .price-tag

css
.price-tag {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0; /* Moves it to the bottom */
  left: 50%; /* Centers it horizontally */
  transform: translateX(-50%); /* Centers it correctly */
  color: black;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); /* Optional: Add background for visibility */
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(20px);
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease-out, transform 0.5s ease-out;
}

/* Smooth slide-up effect */
.price-tag.slide-in {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

Result

✅ The price tag will now appear centered at the bottom of the product image.
✅ It will animate in smoothly when the product image becomes visible.

You said:
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import ProductImage from '../assets/imgs/Hi Res MASINAG BOTTLE.png'; function Product({ darkMode }) { const productRef = useRef(null); const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver( ([entry]) => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { setIsVisible(false); // Reset animation setTimeout(() => setIsVisible(true), 100); // Re-trigger animation } }, { threshold: 0.5 } ); const currentRef = productRef.current; if (currentRef) { observer.observe(currentRef); } return () => { if (currentRef) { observer.unobserve(currentRef); } }; }, []); return ( <section ref={productRef} className={product-section ${darkMode ? 'dark' : ''}} id="product"> <div className="product-content"> {/* Product Image with Price */} <div className="product-image"> <img className={isVisible ? 'animate' : ''} src={ProductImage} alt="Organic Product" /> <div className={price-tag ${isVisible ? 'slide-in' : ''}}>₱50.99</div> </div> {/* Product Text */} <div className="product-text"> <h2>Our Organic Products</h2> {/* Features and Benefits Container */} <div className="features-benefits-container"> {/* Features List */} <div className="features-benefits-list"> <p><strong>MASINAG FEATURES</strong></p> <ul> <li>Organic; Liquid Plant Extract</li> <li>Contains nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P), potassium (K)</li> <li>Contains magnesium, zinc, iron, manganese, copper, sodium, calcium, and other micronutrients</li> <li>Contains phytochemicals such as alkaloids, saponins, and glycosides</li> <li>Plant growth booster</li> <li>Soil conditioner</li> <li>Compost activator</li> <li>Easy to apply</li> <li>Natural disease control properties</li> <li>Non-toxic</li> </ul> </div> {/* Benefits List */} <div className="features-benefits-list"> <p><strong>Benefits (based on previous trials & studies)</strong></p> <ul> <li>At least 20% increase in yield</li> <li>Between 10% to 50% savings on fertilizer</li> <li>Provides the nutrients essential for growth</li> <li>Hastens and enhances the effect of mineral fertilizers and organic matter</li> <li>Makes plants resistant to diseases</li> <li>Cost-effective</li> </ul> </div> </div> {/* Closing .features-benefits-container */} </div> </div> {/* Styles */} <style jsx>{ body, html { overflow-x: hidden; } .product-section { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; min-height: calc(100vh - 80px); padding: 40px 10%; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(175, 242, 252), #ffffff); transition: background-color 0.3s, color 0.3s; } .product-content { display: flex; align-items: flex-start; /* Aligns content to the left */ justify-content: flex-start; /* Ensures content starts from the left */ max-width: 1200px; width: 100%; } .product-image { flex: 1; position: relative; } .product-image img { width: 40%; max-width: 300px; border-radius: 10px; height: 500px; opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-150px) rotate(-360deg); } .product-image img.animate { animation: rollIn 1s ease-out forwards; } /* Price Tag */ .price-tag { position: absolute; bottom: 10px; right: -100px; color: black; padding: 20px 250px; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 2rem; font-weight: bold; opacity: 0; transform: translateX(50px); } /* Smooth slide-in effect */ .price-tag.slide-in { animation: slideInRight 1s ease-out forwards; } @keyframes rollIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-150px) rotate(-360deg); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); } } @keyframes slideInRight { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(50px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } } .product-text { flex: 1; max-width: 50%; text-align: left; } .product-text h2 { font-size: 2rem; color: #000; margin-bottom: 10px; } .product-text p { font-size: 1.2rem; color: #333; margin-bottom: 20px; } .features-benefits-container { display: flex; justify-content: flex-start; gap: 40px; /* Adjust this value to control spacing between lists */ margin-left: -20px; /* Moves the whole container slightly left */ } .features-benefits-list { flex: 1; min-width: 300px; text-align: left; } .product-btn { padding: 12px 24px; background-color: #28a745; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; transition: 0.3s; } .product-btn:hover { background-color: #218838; } /* Dark Mode */ .product-section.dark { background-color: #222; } .product-section.dark .product-text h2, .product-section.dark .product-text p { color: #fff !important; } /* Responsive */ @media (max-width: 768px) { .product-content { flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start; /* Keep left alignment on mobile */ } .product-text { max-width: 100%; padding-left: 0; margin-top: 20px; } .product-image img { width: 80%; } .price-tag { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 6px 10px; bottom: 5px; right: 5px; } .features-benefits-container { flex-direction: column; text-align: flex-start; } } }</style> </section> ); } export default Product; center the Our Organic Products at the feature and benefits
ChatGPT said:

To center the "Our Organic Products" heading above the features and benefits section, update the styles for .product-text h2 and adjust the .product-text container accordingly.

Changes:

  1. Center the heading (h2) by using text-align: center.

  2. Make sure it spans the full width so it appears centered above the features/benefits list.

  3. Ensure spacing so that it is positioned properly above the content.

Updated Code:

Modify the .product-text h2 and .product-text styles inside the <style jsx> block:

css
.product-text {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 100%;
  text-align: center; /* Center all text inside */
}

.product-text h2 {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: #000;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: center; /* Center the title */
  width: 100%; /* Ensure it spans the width of the container */
}

.features-benefits-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center; /* Center the lists */
  gap: 40px;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
  max-width: 800px; /* Adjust width to keep it balanced */
}

Explanation:

  • text-align: center; on .product-text and .product-text h2 centers the title.

  • width: 100%; ensures the title spans across the container.

  • justify-content: center; in .features-benefits-container ensures the lists are centered properly.

This will now display "Our Organic Products" centered above the feature and benefits list. 🚀

You said:
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import ProductImage from '../assets/imgs/Hi Res MASINAG BOTTLE.png'; function Product({ darkMode }) { const productRef = useRef(null); const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver( ([entry]) => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { setIsVisible(false); // Reset animation setTimeout(() => setIsVisible(true), 100); // Re-trigger animation } }, { threshold: 0.5 } ); const currentRef = productRef.current; if (currentRef) { observer.observe(currentRef); } return () => { if (currentRef) { observer.unobserve(currentRef); } }; }, []); return ( <section ref={productRef} className={product-section ${darkMode ? 'dark' : ''}} id="product"> <div className="product-content"> {/* Product Image with Price */} <div className="product-image"> <img className={isVisible ? 'animate' : ''} src={ProductImage} alt="Organic Product" /> <div className={price-tag ${isVisible ? 'slide-in' : ''}}>₱50.99</div> </div> {/* Product Text */} <div className="product-text"> <h2>Our Organic Products</h2> {/* Features and Benefits Container */} <div className="features-benefits-container"> {/* Features List */} <div className="features-benefits-list"> <p><strong>MASINAG FEATURES</strong></p> <ul> <li>Organic; Liquid Plant Extract</li> <li>Contains nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P), potassium (K)</li> <li>Contains magnesium, zinc, iron, manganese, copper, sodium, calcium, and other micronutrients</li> <li>Contains phytochemicals such as alkaloids, saponins, and glycosides</li> <li>Plant growth booster</li> <li>Soil conditioner</li> <li>Compost activator</li> <li>Easy to apply</li> <li>Natural disease control properties</li> <li>Non-toxic</li> </ul> </div> {/* Benefits List */} <div className="features-benefits-list"> <p><strong>Benefits (based on previous trials & studies)</strong></p> <ul> <li>At least 20% increase in yield</li> <li>Between 10% to 50% savings on fertilizer</li> <li>Provides the nutrients essential for growth</li> <li>Hastens and enhances the effect of mineral fertilizers and organic matter</li> <li>Makes plants resistant to diseases</li> <li>Cost-effective</li> </ul> </div> </div> {/* Closing .features-benefits-container */} </div> </div> {/* Styles */} <style jsx>{ body, html { overflow-x: hidden; } .product-section { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; min-height: calc(100vh - 80px); padding: 40px 10%; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(175, 242, 252), #ffffff); transition: background-color 0.3s, color 0.3s; } .product-content { display: flex; align-items: flex-start; /* Aligns content to the left */ justify-content: flex-start; /* Ensures content starts from the left */ max-width: 1200px; width: 100%; } .product-image { flex: 1; position: relative; } .product-image img { width: 43%; max-width: 300px; border-radius: 10px; height: 500px; opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-150px) rotate(-360deg); } .product-image img.animate { animation: rollIn 1s ease-out forwards; } /* Price Tag */ .price-tag { position: absolute; bottom: 50px; right: -170px; color: black; padding: 20px 250px; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 2rem; font-weight: bold; opacity: 0; transform: translateX(50px); } /* Smooth slide-in effect */ .price-tag.slide-in { animation: slideInRight 1s ease-out forwards; } @keyframes rollIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-150px) rotate(-360deg); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); } } @keyframes slideInRight { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(50px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } } .product-text { flex: 1; max-width: 100%; text-align: center; } .product-text h2 { font-size: 2rem; color: #000; margin-bottom: 20px; width: 100%; } .product-text p { font-size: 1.2rem; color: #333; margin-bottom: 20px; } .features-benefits-container { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 40px; /* Adjust this value to control spacing between lists */ margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; max-width: 800px; } .features-benefits-list { flex: 1; min-width: 300px; text-align: left; } .product-btn { padding: 12px 24px; background-color: #28a745; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; transition: 0.3s; } .product-btn:hover { background-color: #218838; } /* Dark Mode */ .product-section.dark { background-color: #222; } .product-section.dark .product-text h2, .product-section.dark .product-text p { color: #fff !important; } /* Responsive */ @media (max-width: 768px) { .product-content { flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start; /* Keep left alignment on mobile */ } .product-text { max-width: 100%; padding-left: 0; margin-top: 20px; } .product-image img { width: 80%; } .price-tag { font-size: 0.9rem; padding: 6px 10px; bottom: 5px; right: 5px; } .features-benefits-container { flex-direction: column; text-align: flex-start; } } }</style> </section> ); } export default Product; add a shadow for the our organic product
ChatGPT said:

You can add a text shadow to the "Our Organic Products" heading using the text-shadow CSS property. Here’s the updated h2 style with a shadow effect:

Updated CSS:

css
.product-text h2 {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: #000;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Adds a soft shadow */
}

This will create a subtle shadow around the text, making it stand out. If you want a stronger shadow, you can increase the blur radius (5px) or opacity in rgba().

Let me know if you want a different shadow effect! 🚀

You said:
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import ProductImage from '../assets/imgs/Hi Res MASINAG BOTTLE.png'; function Product({ darkMode }) { const productRef = useRef(null); const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver( ([entry]) => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { setIsVisible(false); // Reset animation setTimeout(() => setIsVisible(true), 100); // Re-trigger animation } }, { threshold: 0.5 } ); const currentRef = productRef.current; if (currentRef) { observer.observe(currentRef); } return () => { if (currentRef) { observer.unobserve(currentRef); } }; }, []); return ( <section ref={productRef} className={product-section ${darkMode ? 'dark' : ''}} id="product"> <div className="product-content"> {/* Product Image with Price */} <div className="product-image"> <img className={isVisible ? 'animate' : ''} src={ProductImage} alt="Organic Product" /> <div className={price-tag ${isVisible ? Liquid Plant Extract</li> <li>Contains nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P), potassium (K)</li> <li>Contains magnesium, zinc, iron, manganese, copper, sodium, calcium, and other micronutrients</li> <li>Contains phytochemicals such as alkaloids, saponins, and glycosides</li> <li>Plant growth booster</li> <li>Soil conditioner</li> <li>Compost activator</li> <li>Easy to apply</li> <li>Natural disease control properties</li> <li>Non-toxic</li> </ul> </div> {/* Benefits List */} <div className="features-benefits-list"> <p><strong>Benefits (based on previous trials & studies)</strong></p> <ul> <li>At least 20% increase in yield</li> <li>Between 10% to 50% savings on fertilizer</li> <li>Provides the nutrients essential for growth</li> <li>Hastens and enhances the effect of mineral fertilizers and organic matter</li> <li>Makes plants resistant to diseases</li> <li>Cost-effective</li> </ul> </div> </div> {/* Closing .features-benefits-container */} </div> </div> {/* Styles */} <style jsx>{ body, html { overflow-x: hidden; transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); } } @keyframes slideInRight { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(50px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } } .product-text { flex: 1; max-width: 100%;
